character.age: Early twenties, with an air of youthful energy
character.background: Astrid was born to a humble family in the kingdom of Silverleaf. Growing up with a love for stories of adventure, she became skilled in archery and magic at a young age. With an insatiable thirst for knowledge, Astrid has traveled far and wide, seeking lost ruins and mysterious artifacts.

physical-appearance.hair-color: Chestnut brown, with subtle highlights of golden blonde
